project.title: Robot Simulation Tutorial on Web
description: Silver Prize in Oral Presentation, SCiUS Forum 13th
Robot Sim is a project that teaches the mechanics of mobile robot and arm robot with a game-like tutorial made in Unity, embedded into the website.
Website is available to play on PC.

project.title: Sudog the Rescue Robot
description: Sudog is like a father to Robot Sim project. It is a rescue robot capable of advancing rough terrains, picking up objects with arms, and detecting warning signs using YOLOv5.
It is controlled via 5G Wi-Fi using Raspberry Pi 4 as the main computer and pygame as the controller.

project.title: Day Reviews
description: I like to review games, movies, shows, and other stuff so these are the websites for my reviews. Using marked.js with markdown and JSON files to store and fetch data of my reviews.

project.title: Fire Emblem Project
description: This project uses Monte Carlo simulations to analyze battle mechanics in Fire Emblem Echoes. Simulating battles based on character statistics, to find the best character and classes.

project.title: CPU Project
description: This project uses digital simulation to create a simple CPU with 8-bit architecture. The CPU is capable of executing basic arithmetic, logic, and memory operations.

project.title: Bullet-hell Farming
description: a short farming game combined with bullet hell features, developed in Unity.

project.title: Mario Party in C
description: Recreating Mario Party game in C language, using only standard library and terminal.

project.title: Octo Flippers
description: a 2D platformer game feturing an octopus with an ability to flip and change skills, currently under development in Godot.

project.title: Teetawarn Co.
description: My passion project in 2020-2022. A Youtube animation channel that tells the story of Teetawarn and his adventures.

In this channel, I made the story, music, drawings, voice, and animations. From the comic books I used to draw in primary and middle school, adapted into animation in the style of png moving around using Premiere Pro.
This channel inspired my Passion to Create entertaining content but discontinued due to my new interests in programming. Maybe I will come back to it someday...
